title: Toncoin Jumps After '8-Figure' Investment by MEXC Ventures
description: TON blockchain’s token continued its bullish run from last quarter after a partnership announcement with messaging giant Telegram.

title: Is Slack down? Global outage highlights need for communication redundancy for remote teams
description:
On Oct. 6, the digital communication landscape was jolted awake by roughly a 15-minute global Slack outage. This brief interruption had a ripple effect on the remote working world. Digital tools like Slack have become lifelines in our online work routine, especially for remote teams. Today’s short-lived outage highlighted a pivotal but often ignored fact: […]

The post Is Slack down? Global outage highlights need for communication redundancy for remote teams appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BitMEX Co-Founder Arthur Hayes Foresees Unprecedented Bull Market Fueled by Fiat Liquidity and AI Boom
description: In his latest essay, Arthur Hayes, the former CEO of BitMEX, discusses the concept of happiness in the context of market states, particularly focusing on the crypto market. According to Hayes, happiness is relative and is tied to our ability to manipulate universal energy. He extends this idea to market states, arguing that bull markets […]

title: JPMorgan Flags Ethereum’s Growing Centralization and Yield Decline
description: According to CoinDesk, J.P. Morgan has released a research report indicating that Ethereum’s network is becoming increasingly centralized, and its staking yield has diminished, following the Merge and Shanghai upgrades. The report, published on October 5, was led by analysts including Nikolaos Panigirtzoglou. Nikolaos Panigirtzoglou holds the position of Managing Director at J.P. Morgan and operates […]

title: Cross-Party Support Grows to Halt Facial Recognition Surveillance
description: In a remarkable display of unity across party lines, Members of Parliament (MPs) and peers from both the House of Commons and the House of Lords have joined a campaign group’s call for an “immediate stop” to the use of live facial recognition surveillance by both law enforcement agencies and private companies. The call to ... Read more

title: Korea’s Drug Regulator Takes Lead in Shaping AI and Digital Medical Device Guidelines
description: In a significant development, Korea’s Ministry of Food and Drug Safety (MFDS) has emerged as a prominent player in global medical device regulation. At the 24th General Assembly of the International Medical Device Regulators Forum (IMDRF) held in Berlin from September 25 to 29, 2023, MFDS showcased its leadership by actively participating in discussions on ... title: Upland teams up with NFLPA to enhance NFL metaverse experience
description: Upland in collaboration with NFLPA through OneTeam Partners, is launching its third year featuring officially licensed NFL player collections

title: XRP Scores a Legal Victory: Only Altcoin with Clear U.S. Status
description: XRP is now the only altcoin in the US with clear regulatory definitions in the US. This clarity comes after the motion for interlocutory appeal from the SEC was denied in the ongoing legal battle with Ripple. With the court’s rejection of the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) motion for interlocutory appeal, the [...]

title: $23,000,000 Up for Grabs As Basic Income Pilots Prepare to Hand Out Cash Across US
description:
Basic income trials are rolling out across the US as governments and organizations prepare to hand out millions of dollars with no strings attached. A new guaranteed income pilot in Sacramento, California is set to disperse a total of $780,000 over the course of a year. The pilot will give $500 per month to 130 […]
